short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate the completion of questionnaires with the Wequity assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your workflow with the Wequity Chrome extension! Designed to enhance and simplify the completion of ESG and compliance questionnaires, Wequity seamlessly integrates with your internal databases and document management systems. This tool automates data retrieval and form filling, making your questionnaire processes faster and more efficient.

Requirements: Users must have an active Wequity account to utilize this extension (https://wequity.app).

Key Features:
- Automated Data Integration: Pulls data directly from your internal resources.
- Streamlined Questionnaire Completion: Reduces manual entry and increases accuracy.
- User-Friendly Interface: Easy navigation and interaction.
